tab_id=”1514453893766-bd540661-75bf”][vc_column_text]There are no guarantees with psychotherapy or psychiatry. We work in this field because we have seen people achieve tremendous gains form this kind of work. That doesn’t mean that we can guarantee that every person will be helped, but if what you need is something that we can help with then we will use the best available treatments to do our utmost to help. The length of session depends on the situation. A regular Psychotherapy session will last 50 minutes. For an initial assessment with a Psychiatrist of Psychologist this could last 90 minutes…  view all[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How long will my treatment go on for?” tab_id=”1514453893806-9a3afb97-dd96″][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
